sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtcadministcode ( administ_zone_se , administ_zone_code , use_at , administ_zone_nm , upper_administ_zone_code , creat_de , abl_de , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #administZoneSe# , #administZoneCode# , #useAt# , #administZoneNm# , #upperAdministZoneCode# , #creatDe# , #ablDe# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtcadministcode SET administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# , administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode# , use_at = #useAt# , administ_zone_nm = #administZoneNm# , upper_administ_zone_code = #upperAdministZoneCode# , creat_de = #creatDe# , abl_de = #ablDe# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtcadministcode WHERE 1 = 1 AND administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT administ_zone_se , administ_zone_code , use_at , administ_zone_nm , upper_administ_zone_code , creat_de , abl_de , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM COMTCADMINISTCODE WHERE administ_zone_se = #administZoneSe# AND administ_zone_code = #administZoneCode#

SELECT A.ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , A.ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , A.USE_AT , A.ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , A.UPPER_ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , A.CREAT_DE , A.ABL_DE , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ADMINIST_ZONE_SE , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , USE_AT , ADMINIST_ZONE_NM , UPPER_ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE , CREAT_DE , ABL_DE , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTCADMINISTCODE WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ADMINIST_ZONE_SE DESC , ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTCADMINISTCODE WHERE 1=1
ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = #searchKeyword#
ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
